meaningMnemonic: This is the verb version of the vocab word <vocabulary>戦い</vocabulary>, which I'm hoping you learned earlier. The verb version of course means <vocabulary>to fight</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to battle</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 戦い a word you've hopefully seen by now. Associate these words together in your mind and you'll be able to read them so long as you know the other one.
